meanings.sent1: The nonchronological story confused the readers with its jumbled timeline.
meanings.sent2: The nonchronological photo album had pictures from different years mixed together.
meanings.sent3: The nonchronological movie plot had the characters jumping back and forth in time.
meanings.sent4: Her nonchronological way of organizing events was like trying to solve a puzzle without the picture.
meanings.sent5: The nonchronological sequence of events in the book kept the readers on their toes.

meanings.definition: Not arranged in the order of time.
meanings.sent1: The nonchronological exhibit displayed artifacts from different eras side by side.
meanings.sent2: The nonchronological list of events made it hard to understand the historical timeline.
meanings.sent3: The nonchronological arrangement of the room made it feel like stepping into a time machine.
meanings.sent4: Her nonchronological approach to storytelling was like mixing up pieces of a time-travel puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The nonchronological order of the chapters created a sense of mystery and intrigue.
